name: SEROTONIN-DOPAMINE PLANT
description: Being busy over decade with analog photography I was occasionally shocked how accidentally perfect may two frames fall over each other when you unintentionally run the same film through your camera twice. This overlapping would give another dimension and meaning to what was photographed, as if invisible kapellmeister has had his own plans to it, far beyond my own intention. In this new upcoming series "DOUBLE DREAM STRAINS" I tried to recreate this "double exposure" effect digitally merging two (or more) images together.
